Token.Abstract: The CCButton represents a button on the screen. The button is presented with a stretchable background image and/or a title label. Different images, colors and opacity can be set for each of the buttons different states.
Creates a new button with a title and no background. Uses default font and font size.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: The title text of the button.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new button with a title and no background.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: The title text of the button.

Parameter.Name: fontName
Parameter.Abstract: Name of the TTF font to use for the title label.

Parameter.Name: size
Parameter.Abstract: Font size for the title label.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new button with the specified title for the label and sprite frame for its background.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: The title text of the button.

Parameter.Name: spriteFrame
Parameter.Abstract: Stretchable background image.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new button with the speicified title for the label, sprite frames for its background in different states.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: The title text of the button.

Parameter.Name: spriteFrame
Parameter.Abstract: Stretchable background image for the normal state.

Parameter.Name: highlighted
Parameter.Abstract: Stretchable background image for the highlighted state.

Parameter.Name: disabled
Parameter.Abstract: Stretchable background image for the disabled state.

Token.Abstract: Initializes a new button with a title and no background. Uses default font and font size.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: The title text of the button.

Token.Abstract: Initializes a new button with a title and no background.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: The title text of the button.

Parameter.Name: fontName
Parameter.Abstract: Name of the TTF font to use for the title label.

Parameter.Name: size
Parameter.Abstract: Font size for the title label.

Token.Abstract: Initializes a new button with the specified title for the label and sprite frame for its background.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: The title text of the button.

Parameter.Name: spriteFrame
Parameter.Abstract: Stretchable background image.

Token.Abstract: Initializes a new button with the speicified title for the label, sprite frames for its background in different states.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: The title text of the button.

Parameter.Name: spriteFrame
Parameter.Abstract: Stretchable background image for the normal state.

Parameter.Name: highlighted
Parameter.Abstract: Stretchable background image for the highlighted state.

Parameter.Name: disabled
Parameter.Abstract: Stretchable background image for the disabled state.

Token.Abstract: Sets the background color for the specified state. The color is multiplied into the background sprite frame.

Parameter.Name: color
Parameter.Abstract: Color applied to background image.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: State to apply the color to.

Token.Abstract: Gets the background color for the specified state.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: State to get the color for.

Token.Abstract: Sets the background's opacity for the specified state.

Parameter.Name: opacity
Parameter.Abstract: Opacity to apply to the background image

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: State to apply the opacity to.

Token.Abstract: Gets the background opacity for the specified state.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: State to get the opacity for.

Token.Abstract: Will set the label's color for the normal state.

Parameter.Name: color
Parameter.Abstract: Color applied to the label.

Token.Abstract: Sets the label's color for the specified state.

Parameter.Name: color
Parameter.Abstract: Color applied to the label.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: State to set the color for.

Token.Abstract: Gets the label's color for the specified state.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: State to get the color for.

Token.Abstract: Sets the label's opacity for the specified state.

Parameter.Name: opacity
Parameter.Abstract: Opacity applied to the label.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: State to set the opacity for.

Token.Abstract: Gets the label's opacity for the specified state.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: State to get the opacity for.

Token.Abstract: Sets the background's sprite frame for the specified state. The sprite frame will be stretched to the preferred size of the label. If set to NULL no background will be drawn.

Parameter.Name: spriteFrame
Parameter.Abstract: Sprite frame to use for drawing the background.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: State to set the background for.

Token.Abstract: Gets the background's sprite frame for the specified state.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: State to get the sprite frame for.
